creator: sdeboy@iname.com
text:
In log4j 1.3alpha, LoggingEvent has been modified in ways which are
serial-incompatible with log4j 1.2.x.  This will result in errors for anyone
expecting to be able to receive logging events (Chainsaw, SocketHubReceiver).

While we shouldn't need to worry about supporting backward compatibility of
serialization of LoggingEvents back forever, log4j 1.2.x has a large user base
and supporting compatibility would be beneficial to those users who would like
to send serialized logging events to a 1.3 receiver framework but can't update
the appender-side to also use log4j 1.3.
*** Bug 35448 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: carnold@apache.org
